summary.span: 定义配置设置。该配置设置通常用在生产服务器上以重写仅适用于计算机开发的程序级设置。

span.span: Defines a configuration setting that is typically used on a production server to override application-level settings that are appropriate only on development computers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。This constructor is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例 。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定是否在 模式中部署计算机上的 Web 应用程序的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether Web applications on the computer are deployed in mode.

value.span: 如果 Web 应用程序在 模式下部署，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Web applications are deployed in mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 为时 `true` ，ASP.NET 禁用跟踪输出，禁用调试功能，并对远程用户禁用系统生成的详细错误消息。When is `true`, ASP.NET disables trace output, disables debug capabilities, and disables detailed system-generated error messages for remote users. 对于在 `customErrors` 应用程序 Web.config 文件中有元素的应用程序，该 `mode` 属性将强制为 `On` 。For applications that have a `customErrors` element in the application Web.config file, the `mode` attribute is forced to `On`. 这些设置会覆盖在应用程序 Web.config 文件中所做的任何设置。These settings override any settings that are made in application Web.config files. > [!NOTE] > 使用此设置时 `retail` ，应继续 `debug` `false` 在部署到服务器的应用程序 Web.config 文件中将属性设置为。When you use the `retail` setting, you should continue to set the `debug` attribute to `false` in application Web.config files that are deployed to the server. `debug`此设置将禁用请求执行超时值，并且此设置不会被设置重写 `retail` 。The `debug` setting disables request execution timeout, and this is not overridden by the `retail` setting. 有关详细信息，请参阅：For more information, see. [最常见的 ASP.NET 支持问题-从](https://www.hanselman.com/blog/MostCommonASPNETSupportIssuesReportingFromDeepInsideMicrosoftDeveloperSupport.aspx) Scott Hanselman 的博客上的深层 Microsoft 开发人员支持报告。[Most Common ASP.NET Support issues - Reporting from deep inside Microsoft Developer Support](https://www.hanselman.com/blog/MostCommonASPNETSupportIssuesReportingFromDeepInsideMicrosoftDeveloperSupport.aspx) on Scott Hanselman's blog. ## Examples 下面的配置文件示例演示如何将此属性设置为 `true` machine.config 文件中的。The following configuration file example shows how to set this property to `true` in the machine.config file. machine.config 文件位于此文件夹中：The machine.config file is located in this folder: `%windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\Config` ``` ```
